description: useful for when you need to get example to create AutoML Regression/AutomaticRegression model.
useful for when you need to get example to create AutoML Classification/AutomaticClassification model.
example:
Strictly use the Examples to create AutoML instance.
Create an AutomaticRegression instance:
>>> from hana_ml.algorithms.pal.auto_ml import AutomaticRegression
>>> mymodel = AutomaticRegression(generations=2, population_size=5, offspring_size=5, max_eval_time_mins=10)
>>> mymodel.enable_workload_class(<WORKLOAD_CLASS>)
>>> mymodel.fit(data=<data_frame>, key=<ID>, model_table_name=<MODEL_TABLE>, background_size=<background_size>)
Strictly use the Examples to create AutoML instance.
Create an AutomaticClassification instance:
>>> from hana_ml.algorithms.pal.auto_ml import AutomaticClassification
>>> mymodel = AutomaticClassification(generations=2, population_size=5, offspring_size=5, max_eval_time_mins=10)
>>> mymodel.enable_workload_class(<WORKLOAD_CLASS>)
>>> mymodel.fit(data=<data_frame>, key=<ID>, model_table_name=<MODEL_TABLE>, background_size=<background_size>)
